column1: Primula Brandybuck ( - ) was a Hobbits of the Shire
Primula was the youngest child of Gorbadoc Brandybuck and Mirabella Took. She married Drogo Baggins
column2: with whom she had one child
column4: she and her husband drowned when they went boating on the Baranduin.

column1: wikipedia:Primula is a genus of the wikipedia:Primulaceae of plants. It is the Latin name of the primrose and means "little first" because it flowers in early spring.
